document.docAuthor: Qi, Bao-Ying, Schaefer, Carl W. & Xiu-Hua, Lü
document.masterDocTitle: Additions to the mirid (Hemiptera: Heteroptera) fauna of China, 2000 – 2006

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Additions to the mirid (Hemiptera: Heteroptera) fauna of China, 2000 – 2006

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Alcecoris McAtee & Malloch 1924
;
Lin 2004 b
: 318
–326 (key to species).

Alcecoris fraxinusae
Lin 2004 b
: 318
–320, figs. 1 A–B (nov. spec. description; distribution; dorsal view of body; head and antennal segments. Holotype Ψ,TW. Deposited in NMNS . Host plant:
Fraxinus formosanus Roxb.
( Oleaceae )).

Alcecoris formosanus
Lin 2004 b
: 319
–320, figs. 1 C–D (nov. spec. description; distribution; dorsal view of body; head and antennal segments. Holotype Ψ, TW. Deposited in NMNS ). Host plant unknown.

Isometopidea Poppius 1913
;
Lin 2004 b
: 317
–326 (key to species).

Isometopidea formosana
Lin 2004 b
: 319
–321, figs. 1 E–F (nov. spec. description; distribution; dorsal view of body; male genitalia. Holotype ɗ,TW. Deposited in NMNS ). Host plant unknown.

Isometopidea lieweni Poppius 1913
;
Lin & Yang 2004
: 28
, fig. 1 A (nov. record; redescription; distribution. Examined specimens 1 Ψ, TW. Deposited in NMNS ). Host plant unknown.

Isometopus Fieber 1860
;
Lin 2004 b
: 317
–326 (key to species).

Isometopus bipunctatus
Lin 2004 b
: 320
–321, figs. 1 G–H (nov. spec. description; distribution; dorsal view of body; anterior view of head and pronotum. Holotype Ψ,TW, paratypes 2 ΨΨ. Deposited in NMNS ). Host plant unknown.

Isometopus hasegawai Miyamoto 1965
;
Lin & Yang 2004
: 30
–32, fig. 1 C, 2 (nov. record; description; dorsal view of body; genital segment; aedeagus in different views; distribution. Examined specimens 4 ɗ ɗ 2 ΨΨ, TW. Deposited in NMNS ). Host plant unknown.

Isometopus lini
Lin 2004 b
: 321
–324, figs. 2 A–B,G (nov. spec. description; distribution; dorsal view of body; anterior view of head and pronotum; male genitalia. Holotype ɗ, TW, deposited in NMNS ; paratypes 1 ɗ,TW, deposited in TARI ). Host plant unknown.

Isometopus renae
Lin 2004 b
: 322
–324, figs. 2 C–D,H (nov. spec. description; distribution; dorsal view of body; anterior view of head and pronotum; male genitalia. Holotype ɗ, TW. Deposited in TARI ). Host plant unknown.

Isometopus yehi
Lin 2004 b
: 323
–325, figs. 2 E–F,I (nov. spec. description; distribution; dorsal view of body; anterior view of head and pronotum; male genitalia. Holotype ɗ, paratypes 7 ɗ ɗ, TW. Deposited in NMNS ). Host plant unknown.

Myiomma Puton 1872
; Qi 2005 : 509 – 5 l 5 (key to genera and species in China );
Lin & Yang 2004
: 27
–42 (key to species).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Myiomma qinlingensis Qi 2005 : 509
–515, figs. 2–5 (nov. spec. description; distribution; dorsal view of female body; front and lateral view of head and pronotum. Holotype Ψ, SAX . Deposited in DBIMNU). Host plant unknown.

Myiomma samuelsoni Miyamoto 1965
;
Lin & Yang 2004
: 32–33 , fig. 1 D, 3 (nov. record; description; dorsal view of body; genital segment; aedeagus in different views; distribution. Examined specimens 11 ɗ ɗ 2 ΨΨ, TW. Deposited in NMNS ). Host plant unknown.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Myiomma zhengi
Lin & Yang 2004
: 33
–36, figs. 1 E, 4 (nov. spec. description; distribution; dorsal view of body; genital segment; aedeagus in different views; distribution. Holotype ɗ, TW, paratypes 13 ɗ ɗ 9 ΨΨ,TW. Deposited in NMNS ). Host plant unknown.

Myiomma zhoui
Lin & Yang 2004
: 36
–37, figs. 1 F, 5 (nov. spec. description; distribution; dorsal view of body; genital segment; aedeagus in different views; distribution. Holotype ɗ, TW, paratypes 29 ɗ ɗ 12 ΨΨ, TW. Deposited in NMNS ). Host plant unknown.

Sophianus formosanus
Lin & Yang 2004
: 36
, 38–39, figs. 1 G,H, 5 (nov. spec. description; distribution; dorsal view of body; dorsal view of head and antennal segment; genital segment; aedeagus in different views; distribution. Holotype ɗ, TW, paratypes 16 ɗ ɗ 1 Ψ, TW. Deposited in NMNS ). Host plant unknown.

Totta rufercorna
Lin & Yang 2004
: 40
, figs.
1 I
(nov. spec. description; distribution; dorsal view of body; distribution. Holotype Ψ, TW. Deposited in TARI ). Host plant unknown.
